author: matifalcone
title: ALDEA NFT - Community Marketplace
description: ALDEA, the first Latin American DAO, is not currently self-sufficient to generate a treasury to fund its own growth.
solution: ALDEA NFT Marketplace is the first use case of providing a service to the community while attempting to achieve self-sustainability.
experience: ALDEA Core Team Members, Fund5 Winners, FALCO SPO.
